description: Throne Drei`s GN drive disperses red wing-like GN particles similar to green particles emitted by the first Gundam Meister team. Its GN stealth field, which deploys huge pairs of wing GN particles over a wide range, is a powerful ability possessed only by this unit. Its GN shield pod can internally store various missiles, back-up beam sabers and other such equipment that meets tactical needs. Throne Drei is a supplier of GN particles, its able to attach itself to Throne Eins to enhance its beam. Drei can disperse GN particle from its stealth field emitter to defend itself from enemy projectile. It has a customized dock for Neena`s Haro.
name: GNW-003 Gundam Throne Drei
